channel.title: Downsides
channel.description: So what are the downsides of using utorrent to portforward? http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,383567.0.html I heard that it should be used as last option for portforwarding and it's not that good. So I was wondering what bad sides are there?

item.title: Downsides
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

when you close utorrent it closes that port?

Just port forward correctly.

Unless for some reason you dont have static ip in that case all your ISP (internet service provider) and ask them to do that for you.

Read full topic
